import React from "react"; import views from "../../assets/Images/Icons/views.svg" import likes from "../../assets/Images/Icons/likes.svg" import "./main.scss" const Main = ({mainDisplayId}) => { return(

{mainDisplayId.title}

By {mainDisplayId.channel}

{new Date(mainDisplayId.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

{mainDisplayId.views}

{mainDisplayId.likes}

{mainDisplayId.description}

); }; export default Main;
